objects.name: Fusion Data Core
objects.description: Item that increases fusion success rate by 5% per unit (stackable up to +20%).
objects.source_note: Mentioned in 'Cấu trúc cơ bản' and 'Công thức nếu dùng Fusion Data Core'.

objects.name: Stabilizer Module
objects.description: Insurance item that returns all three original Artifacts if fusion fails.

objects.name: Common Artifact
objects.description: Lowest rarity Artifact used as material for fusion.
objects.source_note: Mentioned in the table under 'Gqi y tai nguyén yéu cäu'.

objects.name: Rare Artifact
objects.description: Artifact with increased rarity, used as material for higher-level fusions.
objects.source_note: Mentioned in the table under 'Gqi y tai nguyén yéu cäu'.

objects.name: Epic Artifact
objects.description: High-rarity Artifact requiring significant resources for fusion.
objects.source_note: Mentioned in the table under 'Gqi y tai nguyén yéu cäu'.

objects.name: Legendary Artifact
objects.description: Very high-rarity Artifact with low fusion success rates.
objects.source_note: Mentioned in the table under 'Gqi y tai nguyén yéu cäu'.

objects.name: Mythic Artifact
objects.description: Highest rarity Artifact with extremely low fusion success rates.
objects.source_note: Mentioned in the table under 'Gqi y tai nguyén yéu cäu'.

systems.name: Fusion System
systems.description: Mechanism for upgrading and evolving Artifacts from lower to higher rarities.
systems.mechanics: Players use 3 Artifacts of the same rarity to attempt fusion into a higher rarity Artifact. Success rate decreases with rarity level, and results depend on RNG.
systems.objectives: Create a long-term progression loop for players without relying on class or skill systems.
interactions: Fusion Data Core increases success rate.
Stabilizer Module ensures return of materials on failure.
systems.source_note: Detailed in 'Core Mechanic', 'Cấu trúc cơ bản', and the table.

logic_rules.description: The final success rate is calculated based on the base rate plus any bonuses from Fusion Data Cores.
logic_rules.effect: Success rate is adjusted based on Fusion Data Core usage.
logic_rules.source_note: Detailed in 'Công thức nếu dùng Fusion Data Core'.

logic_rules.description: If fusion fails, the player does not lose all materials; they receive one Artifact of the same level back.

requirements.title: Long-term Progression Loop
requirements.description: Ensure players have a continuous progression path through Artifact fusion.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Players can progress from Common to Mythic Artifacts using the Fusion System.

requirements.title: Balanced Risk-Reward System
requirements.description: Balance time, risk, and reward through fusion success rates and resource costs.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Success rates and resource requirements escalate appropriately with rarity levels.

requirements.title: Fusion Lab UI/UX Design
requirements.description: Design a simple and informative Fusion Lab interface.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Interface displays slot selection, Artifact previews, success rates, costs, animations, and sound cues.
